## DataView.mark() method

Mark a set of rows.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mark(rows?: DataViewRow[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rows | <code>DataViewRow[]</code> | The rows to be selected. |
